com.turnout.ws.controller

Class PartyNotificationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.PartyNotificationController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class PartyNotificationController
extends java.lang.Object
    PartyNotificationController class is front face for accessing and manipulating parties notification related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. Basic CRUD operation is done like update, retrieve and add.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PartyNotificationController(PartyNotificationService partyNotificationService, PartyService partyService, InfoService infoService)
      An injectable constructor with dependencies as argument.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.json.simple.JSONObject addPartyNotification(org.json.simple.JSONObject postVal)
      This method used to save a party notification details into database.It will return a notification id of just updated notification.
      org.json.simple.JSONObject getPartyNotification(int ptyId)
      This method used to get party notification from database based on party id.

    • Method Detail

      • addPartyNotification

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@POST
@Path(value="/addPartyNotification")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject addPartyNotification(org.json.simple.JSONObject postVal)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method used to save a party notification details into database.It will return a notification id of just updated notification.
        Parameters:
        postVal - A JSONOject contains information of party notification.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject that has a value of notification id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception thrown when the required input parameters are empty.

      • getPartyNotification

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/getPartyNotification/partyid/{ptyid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getPartyNotification(@PathParam(value="ptyid")
                                                                             int ptyId)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method used to get party notification from database based on party id.
        Parameters:
        ptyId - A integer value holds party id.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject contains party notification details.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception thrown when the required input parameters are empty.
